description: The AWS::Comprehend::Flywheel resource creates an Amazon Comprehend Flywheel that enables customer to train their model.

ActiveModelArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:comprehend:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]{12}:(document-classifier|entity-recognizer)/[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*(/version/[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*)?  
Update requires: No interruption

DataAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+  
Update requires: No interruption

DataLakeS3Uri.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: s3://[a-z0-9][\.\-a-z0-9]{1,61}[a-z0-9](/.*)?  
Update requires: Replacement

FlywheelName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*$  
Update requires: Replacement

ModelType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DOCUMENT_CLASSIFIER | ENTITY_RECOGNIZER  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LanguageCode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: en | es | fr | it | de | pt  
Update requires: No interruption

TaskConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DataSecurityConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: [-0-9a-zA-Z]+  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 32  
Pattern: [-0-9a-zA-Z]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Subnets.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

VpcConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: ^(?![^\n\r\t,]*\\n|\\r|\\t)[^\n\r\t,]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EntityTypesListItem.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EntityTypes.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:comprehend:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]{12}:flywheel/[a-zA-Z0-9](-*[a-zA-Z0-9])*  
Update requires: No interruption
